string-array.name: pnr_error_texts
string-array.item: Please wait while we split atom to fetch your PNR status!
Taking an atom with heavy nuclei, preparing to bombard it with a neutron..
Sometimes, splitting an atom is easier than fetching PNR status from Indian Railways!!
This long?? Did you enter a valid PNR? or Indian Railways server is down for maintenance.
Life is too short to wait this long... Good luck!
